about_the_game:
The game is a linear visual novel. It has a few choices, but they do not have an impact on the ending, instead they provide different content to the reader.
This is a continuation of Chapter 2. It is highly recommended to play through the other chapters first, before starting this one.

Join Folken as he starts his first adventure in a world that is reigned by magic.
Dive into the complex world of this fantasy story and discover creatures, lore, abilities and a lot of characters with unique personalities.

There are 44 CG's to unlock.
A single playthrough takes about 5 hours.

Story

After successfully escaping the prison, Folken and Meta are granted a second chance.
But what will they do with it?
Things are calming down, but they need a plan on what to do next.
Although, not everything is as peaceful as it seems.

short_description: A Visual Novel game about adventure, fantasy, magic and friendship. This is a continuation of Chapter 2. There are only a few choices that can be made, and some paths to choose from. The decisions do not have an impact on the ending, instead they provide slightly different content.
